ollamaIp.label: Ollama Server IP
ollamaIp.help: IP address or hostname of the direct Ollama server (for status monitoring).

ollamaPort.label: Ollama Server Port
ollamaPort.help: Port of the direct Ollama server (default: 11434).

openWebUIIp.label: OpenWebUI Server IP
openWebUIIp.help: IP address or hostname of the OpenWebUI server.

openWebUIApiKey.label: OpenWebUI API Key
openWebUIApiKey.help: API Key for OpenWebUI authentication (Bearer Token). Get it from Settings > Account in OpenWebUI.

checkOllamaModelRunning.label: Check model status interval
checkOllamaModelRunning.help: Timer to check model availability via direct Ollama connection. Set to 0 to disable.

useVectorDb.label: Use Qdrant
useVectorDb.help: Use Qdrant as vector database for Ollama.

vectorDbIp.label: Qdrant Server IP
vectorDbIp.help: IP address or hostname of the Qdrant server.

embeddingModel.label: Embedding Model
embeddingModel.help: Model to use for generating embeddings.

maxContextResults.label: Max Context Results
maxContextResults.help: Maximum number of context results to include in queries.

vectorDbCollection.label: Vector Collection Name
vectorDbCollection.help: Name of the Qdrant collection to use for storing embeddings.

retentionEnabled.label: Enable Retention Policy
retentionEnabled.help: Enable automatic cleanup of old vector database entries.

retentionDays.label: Retention Days
retentionDays.help: Number of days to keep vector database entries.

retentionMaxEntries.label: Max Entries per Datapoint
retentionMaxEntries.help: Maximum number of entries to keep per datapoint (newest entries are kept).

retentionCleanupInterval.label: Cleanup Interval (hours)
retentionCleanupInterval.help: How often to run retention cleanup (in hours).

enableToolServer.label: Enable Tool Server
enableToolServer.help: Enable OpenWebUI Tool Server for RAG functionality (requires Vector Database).

toolServerHost.label: Tool Server Host
toolServerHost.help: Host interface for the Tool Server to bind to.

toolServerPort.label: Tool Server Port
toolServerPort.help: Port for the Tool Server to listen on.

toolServerChatModel.label: Tool Server Chat Model
toolServerChatModel.help: Model to use for generating answers in RAG queries.

temperature.label: Temperature
temperature.help: Controls randomness in AI responses (0.0 = deterministic, 1.0 = very creative)

maxTokens.label: Max Tokens
maxTokens.help: Maximum number of tokens in AI response

llmRequestTimeout.label: LLM Request Timeout (seconds)
llmRequestTimeout.help: Maximum time to wait for LLM responses (30 seconds to 1 hour).

embeddingTimeout.label: Embedding Timeout (seconds)
embeddingTimeout.help: Maximum time to wait for embedding generation (30 seconds to 30 minutes).

ragQueryTimeout.label: RAG Query Timeout (seconds)
ragQueryTimeout.help: Maximum time to wait for RAG queries (30 seconds to 30 minutes).

progressMonitorInterval.label: Progress Monitor Interval (seconds)
progressMonitorInterval.help: How often to report progress for long-running requests (10 seconds to 2 minutes).

healthMonitoringEnabled.label: Enable Health Monitoring
healthMonitoringEnabled.help: Enable comprehensive health monitoring for all services with HTTP endpoints.

healthMonitoringHost.label: Health Server Host
healthMonitoringHost.help: Host interface for the Health Monitor server to bind to.

healthMonitoringPort.label: Health Server Port
healthMonitoringPort.help: Port for the Health Monitor server to listen on.

healthCheckInterval.label: Health Check Interval (ms)
healthCheckInterval.help: Interval between health checks in milliseconds (minimum: 5 seconds, maximum: 5 minutes).
